自助团体(Self-help Group)是一群有相同问题和困难的人的自愿性结合,成员间通过彼此经验的分享,互相鼓励支持以解决共同的问题。

entry.def: Self-help consists of people providing support and help for each other in an informal way, rather than relying on the government, authorities, or other official organizations.

example.ex: She helped her Mum set up a self-help group for parents with overweight children.
example.tran: 她帮助母亲建起了一个互助会，帮助那些有肥胖孩子的家长。

entry.def: Self-help consists of doing things yourself to try and solve your own problems without depending on other people.

example.ex: ...a society that encourages competitiveness and self-help among the very young.
example.tran: 鼓励培养儿童的竞争意识和自立精神的社会

means.word_mean: 1. the act of helping or improving yourself without relying on anyone else
